snippet: President François Hollande of France rushed to the presidential palace for a dinner with the Russian leader after hosting one with President Obama at a fancy restaurant in town.
abstract: Diplomatic tensions brought on by crisis in Ukraine compel Pres Francois Holland of France to schedule two separate dinners for visits from Pres Barack Obama and Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin.

byline.contributor: Steven Lee Myers and Alexandra Odynova contributed reporting from Moscow.

lead_paragraph: President François Hollande of France rushed to the presidential palace for a dinner with the Russian leader after hosting one with President Obama at a fancy restaurant in town.

headline.main: With Obama and Putin in France for Dinner, Hollande Leaves Room for Seconds
headline.print_headline: With Obama and Putin in France for Dinner, Hollande Leaves Room for Seconds
